UniprotID	Q9H5K3
Accession	Q9H5K3
EntryName	SG196_HUMAN
ProteinName	Protein O-mannose kinase (POMK) (EC 2.7.1.183) (Protein kinase-like protein SgK196) (Sugen kinase 196)
GeneName	POMK SGK196
Length	350
Function	Protein O-mannose kinase that specifically mediates phosphorylation at the 6-position of an O-mannose of the trisaccharide (N-acetylgalactosamine (GalNAc)-beta-1,3-N-acetylglucosamine (GlcNAc)-beta-1,4-mannose) to generate phosphorylated O-mannosyl trisaccharide (N-acetylgalactosamine-beta-1,3-N-acetylglucosamine-beta-1,4-(phosphate-6-)mannose). Phosphorylated O-mannosyl trisaccharide is a carbohydrate structure present in alpha-dystroglycan (DAG1), which is required for binding laminin G-like domain-containing extracellular proteins with high affinity. Only shows kinase activity when the GalNAc-beta-3-GlcNAc-beta-terminus is linked to the 4-position of O-mannose, suggesting that this disaccharide serves as the substrate recognition motif.
Subcellular Location	Endoplasmic reticulum membrane
Disorder	0.8681,0.7120,0.6620,0.7250,0.7331,0.7595,0.6576,0.7120,0.7547,0.7250,0.6427,0.6948,0.5707,0.4801,0.3948,0.2849,0.2470,0.2094,0.1449,0.1229,0.1298,0.1349,0.1349,0.1007,0.0473,0.0287,0.0163,0.0148,0.0136,0.0119,0.0086,0.0073,0.0056,0.0065,0.0092,0.0125,0.0202,0.0240,0.0287,0.0313,0.0405,0.0443,0.0443,0.0719,0.0646,0.1349,0.1251,0.1969,0.2752,0.1611,0.1611,0.1791,0.2884,0.3807,0.3740,0.3426,0.3566,0.2575,0.2575,0.2817,0.2328,0.1554,0.1349,0.0734,0.0817,0.1528,0.0835,0.1424,0.1476,0.1583,0.2034,0.2002,0.2951,0.2164,0.2094,0.2436,0.1852,0.1731,0.2783,0.2783,0.2193,0.2715,0.3426,0.3460,0.3774,0.2503,0.1643,0.2328,0.2503,0.1399,0.1298,0.1942,0.1914,0.1852,0.1969,0.1759,0.1162,0.1583,0.1671,0.0985,0.1007,0.1184,0.1070,0.1184,0.0929,0.1323,0.2364,0.3249,0.2094,0.1298,0.2258,0.2224,0.1373,0.1424,0.1137,0.1028,0.1184,0.1759,0.1162,0.1162,0.1759,0.1731,0.1731,0.1881,0.1251,0.1554,0.1028,0.0605,0.0581,0.0690,0.0646,0.0734,0.0780,0.1349,0.1399,0.1759,0.2193,0.1528,0.1583,0.2470,0.1611,0.1611,0.1852,0.1251,0.1731,0.2258,0.1554,0.2224,0.3117,0.2292,0.3356,0.4441,0.4330,0.3460,0.3494,0.2609,0.2541,0.2849,0.2715,0.2783,0.2752,0.2988,0.3149,0.2884,0.2470,0.2609,0.2609,0.3356,0.2609,0.2680,0.2680,0.2258,0.1731,0.1791,0.1671,0.1115,0.1671,0.1048,0.0605,0.1137,0.0618,0.0334,0.0473,0.0414,0.0398,0.1007,0.0646,0.0662,0.0690,0.1092,0.0662,0.0817,0.0592,0.0817,0.0749,0.1399,0.2002,0.1323,0.2399,0.3249,0.3149,0.3215,0.4017,0.4256,0.3356,0.2609,0.1554,0.2129,0.2094,0.2193,0.1251,0.1702,0.1349,0.1373,0.1115,0.1229,0.1206,0.0690,0.1229,0.0888,0.0543,0.0646,0.0662,0.0454,0.0454,0.0780,0.1251,0.1914,0.1881,0.1583,0.0948,0.1323,0.1323,0.1373,0.2064,0.2258,0.2129,0.2224,0.2224,0.2094,0.2364,0.3249,0.1881,0.2034,0.2364,0.2541,0.2817,0.2988,0.2224,0.1229,0.1791,0.1671,0.2193,0.2436,0.3321,0.2680,0.3019,0.1914,0.1671,0.2541,0.2680,0.1881,0.1424,0.2752,0.3356,0.2680,0.2503,0.2503,0.2328,0.2224,0.3529,0.2328,0.2094,0.2034,0.1184,0.1298,0.1914,0.1028,0.1881,0.1914,0.0985,0.0581,0.0592,0.0780,0.0
